div.p: This work was supported by the Natural Sciences and Engineering Research Council of Canada (Discovery Grant award 293123‚Äê2012RGPIN to EAMS); the Society of Canadian Ornithologists (Taverner Award to JWGS); and the American Ornithologists' Union (Hesse Research Award to JWGS). JWGS was supported by an Ontario Graduate Scholarship. We thank Greg Gloor for assisting with bioinformatic analysis; the Queen's University Biological Station for logistic support; Shawn Garner, Nusha Keyghobadi, and Bryan Neff for advice on study design and interpretation; and Tosha Kelly, Alannah Lymburner, and Dominique Potvin for field assistance.
